definition: to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
erhua variant of 納悶|纳闷[na4 men4]

sentences.english: She wondered why they hadn't given her an answer.
sentences.chinese: 她納悶兒爲什麼他們沒給她回信。

sentences.english: Sophie's mother starts to wonder why all of her ex-boyfriends are showing up on the island.
sentences.chinese: 蘇菲的母親開始納悶爲何她的前男友全出現在島上。

sentences.english: I wonder that he didn't hurt himself jumping over that wall.
sentences.chinese: 我納悶他怎麼從那牆上跳過去竟沒摔傷自己。

sentences.english: I wonder how many other skeleton they have get in their cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 我納悶他們到底還有些什麼家醜。

sentences.english: Search Zhangjiajie tourism network, also has dozens of hundreds of tourists a wonder.
sentences.chinese: 搜索張家界旅遊網，也有幾十上百個，遊客納悶了。

sentences.english: As a child, I wondered why I had to struggle so.
sentences.chinese: 幼年時我納悶爲什麼我非得如此刻苦努力。

sentences.english: When the class ended, he wondered why he didn't hear the cruel taunts of his fellow students.
sentences.chinese: 下課後，他納悶兒同學們爲什麼沒刻薄地奚落他。

sentences.english: The doctors, puzzled at first, finally announced he had some rare disease.
sentences.chinese: 醫生開始還有些納悶，後來宣佈他得了一種怪病。

sentences.english: Maybe you are wondering why I'm donig this for free?
sentences.chinese: 也許你正在納悶爲何我提供此項免費服務呢？

sentences.english: Jenna always wondered what was beyond the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 潔娜總是納悶着地平線的那一邊是什麼。

sentences.english: She could do nothing but stare and wonder.
sentences.chinese: 她只能瞪眼和感到很納悶而已。

sentences.english: Always wondered what happened when a woman birthed triplets ??
sentences.chinese: 我一直在納悶，要是一位女人生三胞胎會怎麼樣？

sentences.english: Jane had been wondering that selfsame thing.
sentences.chinese: 簡也一直在爲同一件事納悶。

sentences.english: He wondered who left the tracks in the snow.
sentences.chinese: 他納悶是誰在雪地上留下了足跡。

sentences.english: There's something I've always been puzzled about.
sentences.chinese: 有一件事我一直納悶兒。

sentences.english: When the class ended, he wondered why he didn"t hear the cruel taunts of his fellow students."
sentences.chinese: 下課後，他納悶兒同學們爲什麼沒刻薄地奚落他。

definition: It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
to speak the truth/truth to tell/frankly
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
to be startled/to be shocked/to be amazed
